DOC.brief_title: A Multiple Dose Study PF-04950615 ( RN316 ) Subjects High Doses Statins
DOC.criteria: On stable daily dose atorvastatin , rosuvastatin simvastatin . Lipids meet follow criterion screen prior dosing : Fasting LDLC great 100 mg/dL fast TG le 400 mg/dL History cardiovascular cerebrovascular event procedure past year . Poorly control type 1 type 2 diabetes mellitus . Poorly control hypertension .
